author: elecharny
msg: o The Leaf is no longer responsible to write the modified page on disk, it's done by either the node referring it, or the BTree if the rootpage is a leaf
o Added a Node constructor that takes ElementHolder as parameters for managed BTrees
o Writing on disk pages when a Leaf has been modified in Node
o Removed a wrong operation on nbElems in the serializePage method
